segments.text: Welcome to your first English lesson about greetings and introductions.
Learning how to greet people properly is one of the most important skills in English.
There are many different ways to say hello, depending on the situation.
In formal settings, we use greetings like 'Good morning', 'Good afternoon', or 'Good evening'.
In casual situations, you might hear 'Hi', 'Hey', or 'Hello' between friends.
When introducing yourself, remember to consider your audience and the context.
Practice these greetings and introductions to build your confidence in English conversations.
